txt.en: 'What is this you say? You found a village of strange, halfling-like creatures? But they are not of the halfling people? I must think on this.'
Scouring the Wood
You have arrived at the first patrol point
'Have you finished your patrol already?'
You have arrived at the second patrol point
'Have you finished your patrol already?'
You have arrived at the third patrol point
The first patrol point is north-east of Echad Idhrenfair.\n\nIdhrenfair has asked you to patrol the paths of the Gloomglens with instructions to keep an eye out for any signs of the Enemy's minions.
'Have you finished your patrol already?'
You have arrived at the fourth patrol point
The second patrol point is north-west of the first.\n\nIdhrenfair has asked you to patrol the paths of the Gloomglens with instructions to keep an eye out for any signs of the Enemy's minions.
'Have you finished your patrol already?'
You have discovered a village of strange creatures
The third patrol point is south-west of the second.\n\nIdhrenfair has asked you to patrol the paths of the Gloomglens with instructions to keep an eye out for any signs of the Enemy's minions.
'Have you finished your patrol already?'
You found a perfect rack of antlers
The fourth patrol point is south of the third.\n\nIdhrenfair has asked you to patrol the paths of the Gloomglens with instructions to keep an eye out for any signs of the Enemy's minions.
The fifth patrol point is east of the fourth.\n\nIdhrenfair has asked you to patrol the paths of the Gloomglens with instructions to keep an eye out for any signs of the Enemy's minions.
Idhrenfair is at Echad Idhrenfair in the Gloomglens of Enedwaith, north-west of the fifth patrol point.\n\nYou should return to Idhrenfair with news of your discoveries.
Scout the first patrol point
Scout the second patrol point
Scout the third patrol point
Scout the fourth patrol point
Scout the fifth patrol point
Talk to Idhrenfair at Echad Idhrenfair
The Rangers of the Grey Company seek to ensure the secrecy of their purpose and their passage through Enedwaith.

'Greetings, [placeholder]. It has been long since we spoke with each other at the Haunted Inn of Audaghaim. I must confess that I am relieved to be gone from that place.

'I understand that you are aware of our purpose and would ask for your assistance. It is of utmost importance that our passage remains hidden from the eyes of the Enemy, and for that purpose are we here in the Gloomglens.

'Will you scout the paths of the Gloomglens and learn whether any enemies patrol these lands? Return here when you have completed your patrol and let me know what you have found.'
